targets.query: SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("value")))  FROM "wu.metric.precipCumulative.gauge" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

SELECT last(*) FROM "wu./forecast/daypart.0.precipChance" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
